introduction.p: This manual is a compiled HTML Help file. You will generate all the "topic" files (modules) as HTML files, except the title page and Welcome file. Help project files, including a table of contents and index are also generated. You will compile them using the Microsoft Help Workshop.

prerequisites.p: Before you begin, make sure you have:

ul.li: Permission from the Language Software Test Department
The complete and latest XML source from the document control system.

steps.p: Here are the steps for building this manual:
steps.step: Use batch files to generate all HTML content from XML source.
Use Microsoft HTML Help Workshop to compile.
Check the compiled HTML Help file into the document control system.
